summary.span: 表示一个 XML 元素。

span.span: Represents an XML element.

summary.span: 有关用法信息和示例，请参阅本页的 [XElement 类概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d35180fe-7016-4895-9bfc-ba1e3f7875ec)和“备注”部分。

span.span: See [XElement Class Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d35180fe-7016-4895-9bfc-ba1e3f7875ec) and the Remarks section on this page for usage information and examples.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类表示 XML 元素，基本的 XML 构造。This class represents an XML element, the fundamental XML construct. 请参阅[XElement 类概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d35180fe-7016-4895-9bfc-ba1e3f7875ec)其他使用情况信息。See [XElement Class Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d35180fe-7016-4895-9bfc-ba1e3f7875ec) for other usage information. 元素具有，则可以选择一个或多个属性，并可以根据需要包含内容 (有关详细信息，请参阅)。An element has an , optionally one or more attributes, and can optionally contain content (for more information, see ). 可以包含以下类型的内容：An can contain the following types of content: - - - - 有关有效的内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content of an , see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 派生自，它派生。 derives from , which derives from . 某些可以从 XAML 使用方法。Some methods can be used from XAML. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [LINQ to XML 动态属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0455f47c-4a68-4f2e-a3f8-dd1d85b99012)。For more information, see [LINQ to XML Dynamic Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0455f47c-4a68-4f2e-a3f8-dd1d85b99012). ## Examples 以下示例创建 XML 树。The following example creates an XML tree. 新元素的内容来自于 LINQ 查询。The content of the new element comes from a LINQ query. ```csharp XElement xmlTree1 = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5), new XElement("Child6", 6) ); XElement xmlTree2 = new XElement("Root", from el in xmlTree1.Elements() where((int)el >= 3 && (int)el <= 5) select el ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree2); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree1 As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 6 Dim xmlTree2 As XElement = _ <%= From el In xmlTree1.Elements() _ Where el.Value >= 3 And el.Value <= 5 _ Select el %> Console.WriteLine(xmlTree2) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 ``` 下面是相同的示例中，但在这种情况下 XML 命名空间中。The following is the same example, but in this case the XML is in a namespace. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XML 命名空间](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement xmlTree1 = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XElement(aw + "Child1", 1), new XElement(aw + "Child2", 2), new XElement(aw + "Child3", 3), new XElement(aw + "Child4", 4), new XElement(aw + "Child5", 5), new XElement(aw + "Child6", 6) ); XElement xmlTree2 = new XElement(aw + "Root", from el in xmlTree1.Elements() where((int)el >= 3 && (int)el <= 5) select el ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree2); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim xmlTree1 As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 6 Dim xmlTree2 As XElement = _ <%= From el In xmlTree1.Elements() _ Where el.Value >= 3 And el.Value <= 5 _ Select el %> Console.WriteLine(xmlTree2) End SUb End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 ```

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关可以传递给此构造函数的有效内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this constructor, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 从字符串到隐式转换。There is an implicit conversion from string to . 此构造函数的典型用法是指定一个字符串而不是创建一个新参数作为。Typical use of this constructor is to specify a string as the parameter instead of creating a new . 在创建时元素的命名空间中，典型用法是使用加法运算符重载具有和一个字符串来创建。When creating an element in a namespace, typical use is to use the addition operator overload with an and a string to create an . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XML 命名空间](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ## Examples 以下示例创建 XML 树。The following example creates an XML tree. 新元素的内容来自于 LINQ 查询。The content of the new element comes from a LINQ query. ```csharp XElement xmlTree1 = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5), new XElement("Child", 6) ); XElement xmlTree2 = new XElement("Root", from el in xmlTree1.Elements() where((int)el >= 3 && (int)el <= 5) select el ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree2); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree1 As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 6 Dim xmlTree2 As XElement = _ <%= From el In xmlTree1.Elements() _ Where el.Value >= 3 And el.Value <= 5 _ Select el %> Console.WriteLine(xmlTree2) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数生成一个元素的深层副本。This constructor makes a deep copy of an element. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 XML 树中，创建的树中，克隆，然后调用，用于测试两个 XML 树是否相等。The following example creates an XML tree, creates a clone of the tree, and then calls , which tests whether the two XML trees are equal. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", 1), new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2) ); // Create a clone of the tree. XElement treeClone = new XElement(xmlTree); Console.WriteLine("xmlTree = treeClone: {0}", XNode.DeepEquals(xmlTree, treeClone)); // Do some work with xmlTree, perhaps pass it to other methods. xmlTree.Add(new XElement("Child3", 3)); Console.WriteLine("xmlTree = treeClone: {0}", XNode.DeepEquals(xmlTree, treeClone)); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 ' Create a clone of the tree. Dim treeClone As XElement = New XElement(xmlTree) Console.WriteLine("xmlTree = treeClone: {0}", XNode.DeepEquals(xmlTree, treeClone)) ' Do some work with xmlTree, perhaps pass it to other methods. xmlTree.Add(New XElement("Child3", 3)) Console.WriteLine("xmlTree = treeClone: {0}", XNode.DeepEquals(xmlTree, treeClone)) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` xmlTree = treeClone: True xmlTree = treeClone: False ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建任何内容也没有属性的元素。This constructor creates an element with no content and no attributes. 从字符串到隐式转换。There is an implicit conversion from string to . 此构造函数的典型用法是指定一个字符串而不是创建一个新参数作为。Typical use of this constructor is to specify a string as the parameter instead of creating a new . 在创建时元素的命名空间中，典型用法是使用加法运算符重载具有和一个字符串来创建。When creating an element in a namespace, typical use is to use the addition operator overload with an and a string to create an . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XML 命名空间](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有任何内容的元素。The following example creates an element with no content. ```csharp XElement el = new XElement("Root"); Console.WriteLine(el); ``` ```vb Dim el As XElement = Console.WriteLine(el) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml ``` 下面的示例在包含任何内容的命名空间中创建一个元素。The following example creates an element in a namespace with no content. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XML 命名空间](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ``` XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root"); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root = Console.WriteLine(root) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数循环访问指定的内容，并创建具有其内容的元素。This constructor iterates through the contents of the specified , and creates an element with its contents. ## Examples 以下示例创建一个源 XML 树，并创建上源 XML 树从查询。The following example creates a source XML tree, and then creates an from a query on the source XML tree. 它然后将序列化控制台中，向源 XML 树中，添加新元素，然后将序列化试。It then serializes the to the console, adds a new element to the source XML tree, and then serializes the again. 您可以看到新添加的源 XML 树到该元素不包含在第一个序列化，但包含在第二个。You can see that element newly added to the source XML tree is not included in the first serialization, but is included in the second. ```csharp XElement src = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3) ); XStreamingElement xse = new XStreamingElement("NewRoot", from el in src.Elements() where (int)el >= 2 select el ); Console.WriteLine(xse); src.Add(new XElement("Child4", 4)); Console.WriteLine("----"); Console.WriteLine(xse); ``` ```vb Dim src As XElement = _ 1 2 3 Dim xse As XStreamingElement = New XStreamingElement("NewRoot", _ From el In src.Elements() _ Where (CInt(el) >= 2) _ Select el _ ) Console.WriteLine(xse) src.Add(New XElement("Child4", 4)) Console.WriteLine("----") Console.WriteLine(xse) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` 2 3 ---- 2 3 4 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用指定的内容和特性创建的元素。This constructor creates an element with the specified content and attributes. 从字符串到隐式转换。There is an implicit conversion from string to . 此构造函数的典型用法是指定一个字符串而不是创建一个新参数作为。Typical use of this constructor is to specify a string as the parameter instead of creating a new . 在创建时元素的命名空间中，典型用法是使用加法运算符重载具有和一个字符串来创建。When creating an element in a namespace, typical use is to use the addition operator overload with an and a string to create an . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XML 命名空间](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). 有关可以传递给此构造函数的有效内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this constructor, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). ## Examples 以下示例创建 XML 树。The following example creates an XML tree. 新元素的内容来自于 LINQ 查询。The content of the new element comes from a LINQ query. ```csharp XElement xmlTree1 = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5), new XElement("Child6", 6) ); XElement xmlTree2 = new XElement("Root", from el in xmlTree1.Elements() where((int)el >= 3 && (int)el <= 5) select el ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree2); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree1 As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 6 Dim xmlTree2 As XElement = _ <%= From el In xmlTree1.Elements() _ Where el.Value >= 3 And el.Value <= 5 _ Select el %> Console.WriteLine(xmlTree2) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 ``` 下面的示例创建具有各种类型的内容的 XML 树。The following example creates an XML tree with a variety of types of content. ```csharp XElement root; // String content: root = new XElement("Root", "Some text"); Console.WriteLine(root); // XElement object content: root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("NewChild", "n") ); Console.WriteLine(root); // XAttribute object content: root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("NewAttribute", "n") ); Console.WriteLine(root); // Double content: double dbl = 12.345; root = new XElement("Root", dbl); Console.WriteLine(root); // DateTime content: DateTime dt = new DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 00); root = new XElement("Root", dt); Console.WriteLine(root); // String array content: // Any collection other than a collection of XElement or XAttribute objects // are converted to strings. The strings are concatenated and added. string[] stringArray = { "abc", "def", "ghi" }; root = new XElement("Root", stringArray); Console.WriteLine(root); // XElement object array content: XElement[] ellArray = { new XElement("NewChild1", 1), new XElement("NewChild2", 2), new XElement("NewChild3", 3) }; root = new XElement("Root", ellArray); Console.WriteLine(root); // XAttribute object array content: XAttribute[] attArray = { new XAttribute("NewAtt1", 1), new XAttribute("NewAtt2", 2), new XAttribute("NewAtt3", 3) }; root = new XElement("Root", attArray); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement ' String content: root = Some text Console.WriteLine(root) ' XElement object content: root = n Console.WriteLine(root) ' XAttribute object content: root = Console.WriteLine(root) ' Double content: Dim dbl As Double = 12.345 root = <%= dbl %> Console.WriteLine(root) ' DateTime content: Dim dt As DateTime = New DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 0) root = <%= dt %> Console.WriteLine(root) ' String array content: ' Any collection other than a collection of XElement or XAttribute objects ' are converted to strings. The strings are concatenated and added. Dim stringArray As String() = { _ "abc", _ "def", _ "ghi" _ } root = <%= stringArray %> Console.WriteLine(root) ' XElement object array content: Dim ellArray As XElement() = { _ 1, _ 2, _ 3 _ } root = <%= ellArray %> Console.WriteLine(root) ' XAttribute object array content Dim attArray As XAttribute() = { _ New XAttribute("NewAtt1", 1), _ New XAttribute("NewAtt2", 2), _ New XAttribute("NewAtt3", 3) _ } root = <%= attArray %> Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Some text n 12.345 2006-10-06T12:30:00 abcdefghi 1 2 3 ``` 下面的示例在一个命名空间中创建 XML 树。The following example creates an XML tree in a namespace. ```csharp // Create an XML tree in a namespace. XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XElement(aw + "Child", "child content") ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb ' Create an XML tree in a namespace. Dim root As XElement = _ child content Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml child content ``` 下面的示例使用嵌套的命名空间中创建 XML 树。The following example creates an XML tree with nested namespaces. ```csharp // Create an XML tree with nested namespaces. XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XNamespace fc = "www.fourthcoffee.com"; XDocument root = new XDocument( new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "yes"), new XElement(aw + "Root", new XElement(fc + "Child", new XElement(aw + "DifferentChild", "other content") ) ) ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb ' Create an XML tree with nested namespaces. Dim root As XDocument = _ other content Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml other content ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用指定的内容和特性创建的元素。This constructor creates an element with the specified content and attributes. 从字符串到隐式转换。There is an implicit conversion from string to . 此构造函数的典型用法是指定一个字符串而不是创建一个新参数作为。Typical use of this constructor is to specify a string as the parameter instead of creating a new . 在创建时元素的命名空间中，典型用法是使用加法运算符重载具有和一个字符串来创建。When creating an element in a namespace, typical use is to use the addition operator overload with an and a string to create an . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XML 命名空间](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). 有关可以传递给此构造函数的有效内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this constructor, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). ## Examples 以下示例创建 XML 树。The following example creates an XML tree. 新元素的内容来自于 LINQ 查询。The content of the new element comes from a LINQ query. ```csharp XElement xmlTree1 = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5), new XElement("Child6", 6) ); XElement xmlTree2 = new XElement("Root", from el in xmlTree1.Elements() where((int)el >= 3 && (int)el <= 5) select el ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree2); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree1 As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 6 Dim xmlTree2 As XElement = _ <%= From el In xmlTree1.Elements() _ Where el.Value >= 3 And el.Value <= 5 _ Select el %> Console.WriteLine(xmlTree2) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 ``` 下面的示例创建具有各种类型的内容的 XML 树。The following example creates an XML tree with a variety of types of content. ```csharp XElement root; // String content: root = new XElement("Root", "Some text"); Console.WriteLine(root); // XElement object content: root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("NewChild", "n") ); Console.WriteLine(root); // XAttribute object content: root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("NewAttribute", "n") ); Console.WriteLine(root); // Double content: double dbl = 12.345; root = new XElement("Root", dbl); Console.WriteLine(root); // DateTime content: DateTime dt = new DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 00); root = new XElement("Root", dt); Console.WriteLine(root); // String array content: // Any collection other than a collection of XElement or XAttribute objects // are converted to strings. The strings are concatenated and added. string[] stringArray = { "abc", "def", "ghi" }; root = new XElement("Root", stringArray); Console.WriteLine(root); // XElement object array content: XElement[] ellArray = { new XElement("NewChild1", 1), new XElement("NewChild2", 2), new XElement("NewChild3", 3) }; root = new XElement("Root", ellArray); Console.WriteLine(root); // XAttribute object array content: XAttribute[] attArray = { new XAttribute("NewAtt1", 1), new XAttribute("NewAtt2", 2), new XAttribute("NewAtt3", 3) }; root = new XElement("Root", attArray); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement ' String content: root = Some text Console.WriteLine(root) ' XElement object content: root = n Console.WriteLine(root) ' XAttribute object content: root = Console.WriteLine(root) ' Double content: Dim dbl As Double = 12.345 root = <%= dbl %> Console.WriteLine(root) ' DateTime content: Dim dt As DateTime = New DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 0) root = <%= dt %> Console.WriteLine(root) ' String array content: ' Any collection other than a collection of XElement or XAttribute objects ' are converted to strings. The strings are concatenated and added. Dim stringArray As String() = { _ "abc", _ "def", _ "ghi" _ } root = <%= stringArray %> Console.WriteLine(root) ' XElement object array content: Dim ellArray As XElement() = { _ 1, _ 2, _ 3 _ } root = <%= ellArray %> Console.WriteLine(root) ' XAttribute object array content Dim attArray As XAttribute() = { _ New XAttribute("NewAtt1", 1), _ New XAttribute("NewAtt2", 2), _ New XAttribute("NewAtt3", 3) _ } root = <%= attArray %> Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Some text n 12.345 2006-10-06T12:30:00 abcdefghi 1 2 3 ``` 下面的示例在一个命名空间中创建 XML 树。The following example creates an XML tree in a namespace. ```csharp // Create an XML tree in a namespace. XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XElement(aw + "Child", "child content") ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb ' Create an XML tree in a namespace. Dim root As XElement = _ child content Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml child content ``` 下面的示例使用嵌套的命名空间中创建 XML 树。The following example creates an XML tree with nested namespaces. ```csharp // Create an XML tree with nested namespaces. XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XNamespace fc = "www.fourthcoffee.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XElement(fc + "Child", new XElement(aw + "DifferentChild", "other content") ) ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb ' Create an XML tree with nested namespaces. Dim root As XDocument = _ other content Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml other content ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回集合中的元素的顺序相反的文档。The elements in the returned collection are in reverse document order. 此方法使用延迟执行。This method uses deferred execution. ## Examples 以下示例创建 XML 树。The following example creates an XML tree. 然后，查找`GrandChild`元素，然后输出其上级。It then finds the `GrandChild` element, and then prints the ancestors of it. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", new XElement("GrandChild", "element content") ) ); XElement gc = xmlTree.Element("Child").Element("GrandChild"); IEnumerable aas = from el in gc.AncestorsAndSelf() select el; foreach (XElement el in aas) Console.WriteLine(el.Name); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ element content Dim GC As XElement = xmlTree..(0) Dim aas As IEnumerable(Of XElement) = _ From el In GC.AncestorsAndSelf() _ Select el For Each el In aas Console.WriteLine(el.Name) Next ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` GrandChild Child Root ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些返回元素或属性的集合。Some return collections of elements or attributes. 此方法返回单个属性。This method returns only a single attribute. 有时这称为*singleton* (与*集合*)。Sometimes this is referred to as a *singleton* (in contrast to a *collection*). Visual Basic 用户可以使用集成的 attribute 轴检索具有指定名称的属性值。Visual Basic users can use the integrated attribute axis to retrieve the value of an attribute with a specified name. ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有属性的元素。The following example creates an element with an attribute. 然后，它检索使用此方法的属性。It then retrieves the attribute using this method. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att", "attribute content") ); XAttribute att = xmlTree.Attribute("Att"); Console.WriteLine(att); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = Dim att As XAttribute = xmlTree.Attribute("Att") Console.WriteLine(att) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Att="attribute content" ``` 下面是相同的示例中，但在这种情况下 XML 命名空间中。The following is the same example, but in this case the XML is in a namespace. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XML 命名空间](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement xmlTree = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), new XAttribute(aw + "Att", "attribute content") ); XAttribute att = xmlTree.Attribute(aw + "Att"); Console.WriteLine(att); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim xmlTree As XElement = Dim att As XAttribute = xmlTree.Attribute(GetXmlNamespace(aw) + "Att") Console.WriteLine(att) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` aw:Att="attribute content" ```

IEnumerable attList = from at in xmlTree.Attributes() select at; foreach (XAttribute att in attList) Console.WriteLine(att); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = Dim attList As IEnumerable(Of XAttribute) = _ From at In xmlTree.Attributes() _ Select at For Each att In attList Console.WriteLine(att) Next ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Att1="content1" Att2="content2" ``` 下面是相同的示例中，但在这种情况下 XML 命名空间中。The following is the same example, but in this case the XML is in a namespace. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XML 命名空间](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430). ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement xmlTree = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(aw + "Att1", "content1"), new XAttribute(aw + "Att2", "content2"), new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com") ); IEnumerable attList = from at in xmlTree.Attributes() select at; foreach (XAttribute att in attList) Console.WriteLine(att); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim xmlTree As XElement = Dim attList As IEnumerable(Of XAttribute) = _ From at In xmlTree.Attributes() _ Select at For Each att In attList Console.WriteLine(att) Next End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` aw:Att1="content1" aw:Att2="content2" xmlns:aw="http://www.adventure-works.com" ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks Namespace 声明可以作为 XML 树中的属性保存。Namespace declarations may be persisted as attributes in the XML tree. 这些特殊属性声明命名空间，包括默认命名空间。These special attributes declare namespaces, including default namespaces. 此方法将查找声明默认命名空间，如果有的话，命名空间声明，并返回用于默认命名空间。This method finds the namespace declaration that declares the default namespace, if there is one, and returns the for the default namespace. 如果声明默认命名空间，没有属性，则此方法返回。If there is no attribute that declares the default namespace, then this method returns . 在创建 XML 树，使用 C# 中，即使将从如果命名空间不保存在 XML 树中作为属性，则使用默认命名空间中，序列化 XML 树时，此方法将不报告命名空间为默认命名空间。When creating XML trees using C#, even if an XML tree would be serialized with a default namespace, if the namespace is not persisted in the XML tree as an attribute, this method will not report the namespace as the default namespace. 时如果使用导入语句的默认命名空间中创建 XML 创建 XML 树，使用 Visual Basic 和 XML 文本，然后命名空间属性将会在树中创建 Visual Basic 编译器，并且此方法将报告该命名空间。When creating XML trees using Visual Basic and XML literals, if you create the XML in a default namespace using the Imports statement, then a namespace attribute will be created in the tree by the Visual Basic compiler, and this method will report that namespace. ## Examples 以下示例创建具有默认命名空间的 XML 树。The following example creates an XML tree that has a default namespace. 它然后使用此方法检索默认命名空间。It then uses this method to retrieve the default namespace. ```csharp String xml = ""; XElement e = XElement.Parse(xml); Console.WriteLine("Default namespace: {0}", e.GetDefaultNamespace()); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim e As XElement = Console.WriteLine("Default namespace: {0}", e.GetDefaultNamespace()) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Default namespace: http://www.adventure-works.com ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果源 XML 是缩进，则将设置标记中`options`导致读取器读取的源 XML 中的所有空白区域。If the source XML is indented, setting the flag in `options` causes the reader to read all white space in the source XML. 类型的节点为重要并无意义的空白区域创建。Nodes of type are created for both significant and insignificant white space. 如果源 XML 是缩进，则将不设置标记中`options`导致读取器忽略所有源 XML 中无意义的空白。If the source XML is indented, not setting the flag in `options` causes the reader to ignore all of the insignificant white space in the source XML. 不包括无关紧要的空白区域任何文本节点创建 XML 树。The XML tree is created without any text nodes for insignificant white space. 如果源 XML 不缩进，则将设置标记中`options`不起作用。If the source XML is not indented, setting the flag in `options` has no effect. 仍保留有效空白，并有可能导致创建多个空白文本节点的无用空格没有范围。Significant white space is still preserved, and there are no spans of insignificant white space that could cause the creation of more white space text nodes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载或分析 XML 时保留空白](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)并[保留空白区域序列化时](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). 使用若要创建从包含 XML 的字符串。Use to create an from a string that contains XML. 设置不会影响从加载时。Setting will have no effect when loading from a . 如果您设置，则对性能产生负面影响标志。There is a performance penalty if you set the flag. XML 文档加载后的行信息是准确的。The line information is accurate immediately after loading the XML document. 如果在加载文档之后修改 XML 树，行信息可能会变得毫无意义。If you modify the XML tree after loading the document, the line information may become meaningless. LINQ to XML 的加载功能基于。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能会捕获引发的任何异常重载的方法和方法来读取和分析该文档。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下面的示例加载从两个不同的方式： 保留空白，并且不保留空白。The following example loads an from a in two different ways: preserving white space, and not preserving white space. 然后使用查询来确定生成的 XML 树中的空白节点的数目。It then uses a query to determine the number of white space nodes in the resulting XML tree. ```csharp TextReader sr; int whiteSpaceNodes; sr = new StringReader(" "); XElement xmlTree1 = XElement.Load(sr, LoadOptions.None); sr.Close(); whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree1 .DescendantNodesAndSelf() .OfType() .Where(tNode => tNode.ToString().Trim().Length == 0) .Count(); Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes); sr = new StringReader(" "); XElement xmlTree2 = XElement.Load(sr, LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace); sr.Close(); whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree2 .DescendantNodesAndSelf() .OfType() .Where(tNode => tNode.ToString().Trim().Length == 0) .Count(); Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes); ``` ```vb Dim sr As TextReader Dim whiteSpaceNodes As Integer sr = New StringReader(" ") Dim xmlTree1 As XElement = XElement.Load(sr, LoadOptions.None) sr.Close() whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree1 _ .DescendantNodesAndSelf() _ .OfType(Of XText)() _ .Where(Function(ByVal tNode As XNode) tNode.ToString().Trim().Length = 0) _ .Count() Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes) sr = New StringReader(" ") Dim xmlTree2 As XElement = XElement.Load(sr, LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace) sr.Close() whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree2 _ .DescendantNodesAndSelf() _ .OfType(Of XText)() _ .Where(Function(ByVal tNode As XNode) tNode.ToString().Trim().Length = 0) _ .Count() Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): 0 Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): 3 ``` 下面的示例从在加载的行信息。The following example loads the line information as it loads from the . 然后，它将打印的行信息。It then prints the line information. ```csharp TextReader sr = new StringReader( @" "); XElement po = XElement.Load(sr, LoadOptions.SetLineInfo); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "Element Name".PadRight(20), "Line".PadRight(5), "Position"); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "------------".PadRight(20), "----".PadRight(5), "--------"); foreach (XElement e in po.DescendantsAndSelf()) Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) + e.Name).PadRight(20), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LinePosition); ``` ```vb Dim sr As TextReader = New StringReader( _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ "") Dim po As XElement = XElement.Load(sr, LoadOptions.SetLineInfo) Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "Element Name".PadRight(20), _ "Line".PadRight(5), _ "Position") Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "------------".PadRight(20), _ "----".PadRight(5), _ "--------") For Each e As XElement In po.DescendantsAndSelf() Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) & e.Name.ToString).PadRight(20), _ (DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo)).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), _ (DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo)).LinePosition) Next ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Element Name Line Position ------------ ---- -------- Root 1 2 Child 2 4 GrandChild1 3 6 GrandChild2 4 6 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果源 XML 是缩进，则将设置标记中`options`导致读取器读取的源 XML 中的所有空白区域。If the source XML is indented, setting the flag in `options` causes the reader to read all white space in the source XML. 类型的节点为重要并无意义的空白区域创建。Nodes of type are created for both significant and insignificant white space. 如果源 XML 是缩进，则将不设置标记中`options`导致读取器忽略所有源 XML 中无意义的空白。If the source XML is indented, not setting the flag in `options` causes the reader to ignore all of the insignificant white space in the source XML. 不包括无关紧要的空白区域任何文本节点创建 XML 树。The XML tree is created without any text nodes for insignificant white space. 如果源 XML 不缩进，则将设置标记中`options`不起作用。If the source XML is not indented, setting the flag in `options` has no effect. 仍保留有效空白，并有可能导致创建多个空白文本节点的无用空格没有范围。Significant white space is still preserved, and there are no spans of insignificant white space that could cause the creation of more white space text nodes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载或分析 XML 时保留空白](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)并[保留空白区域序列化时](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). 使用若要创建从包含 XML 的字符串。Use to create an from a string that contains XML. 如果您设置，则对性能产生负面影响和标志。There is a performance penalty if you set the and the flags. 在加载 XML 文档之后立即是准确的基 URI 和行信息。The base URI and the line information are accurate immediately after loading the XML document. 如果在加载文档之后修改 XML 树，基 URI 和行信息可能变得毫无意义。If you modify the XML tree after loading the document, the base URI and line information may become meaningless. LINQ to XML 的加载功能基于。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能会捕获引发的任何异常重载的方法和方法来读取和分析该文档。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下面的示例加载文件中两种不同方法： 保留空白，并且不保留空白。The following example loads an from a file in two different ways: preserving white space, and not preserving white space. 然后使用查询来确定生成的 XML 树中的空白节点的数目。It then uses a query to determine the number of white space nodes in the resulting XML tree. ```csharp XElement xmlTree1 = XElement.Parse(" ", LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace); xmlTree1.Save("Tree.xml"); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree1); int whiteSpaceNodes; XElement xmlTree2 = XElement.Load("Tree.xml", LoadOptions.None); whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree2 .DescendantNodesAndSelf() .OfType() .Where(tNode => tNode.ToString().Trim().Length == 0) .Count(); Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes); XElement xmlTree3 = XElement.Load("Tree.xml", LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace); whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree3 .DescendantNodesAndSelf() .OfType() .Where(tNode => tNode.ToString().Trim().Length == 0) .Count(); Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree1 As XElement = XElement.Parse(" ", LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace) xmlTree1.Save("Tree.xml") Console.WriteLine(xmlTree1) Dim whiteSpaceNodes As Integer Dim xmlTree2 As XElement = XElement.Load("Tree.xml", LoadOptions.None) whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree2 _ .DescendantNodesAndSelf() _ .OfType(Of XText)() _ .Where(Function(ByVal tNode As XNode) tNode.ToString().Trim().Length = 0) _ .Count() Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes) Dim xmlTree3 As XElement = XElement.Load("Tree.xml", LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace) whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree3 _ .DescendantNodesAndSelf() _ .OfType(Of XText)() _ .Where(Function(ByVal tNode As XNode) tNode.ToString().Trim().Length = 0) _ .Count() Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): 0 Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): 3 ``` 下面的示例加载基 URI 和行信息，因为它会加载该文件。The following example loads the base URI and line information as it loads the file. 然后列显的基 URI 和行信息。It then prints the base URI and the line information. 此示例使用以下资源文件：[示例 XML 文件： 典型采购订单 (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0606c09f-6e43-4f8d-95c8-e8e2e08d2348)。This example uses the following resource file: [Sample XML File: Typical Purchase Order (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0606c09f-6e43-4f8d-95c8-e8e2e08d2348). ```csharp XElement po = XElement.Load("PurchaseOrder.xml", LoadOptions.SetBaseUri | LoadOptions.SetLineInfo); string[] splitUri = po.BaseUri.Split('/'); Console.WriteLine("BaseUri: {0}", splitUri[splitUri.Length - 1]); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "Element Name".PadRight(20), "Line".PadRight(5), "Position"); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "------------".PadRight(20), "----".PadRight(5), "--------"); foreach (XElement e in po.DescendantsAndSelf()) Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) + e.Name).PadRight(20), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LinePosition); ``` ```vb Dim po As XElement = XElement.Load("PurchaseOrder.xml", LoadOptions.SetBaseUri Or LoadOptions.SetLineInfo) Dim splitUri() As String = po.BaseUri.Split("/") Console.WriteLine("BaseUri: {0}", splitUri(splitUri.Length - 1)) Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "Element Name".PadRight(20), _ "Line".PadRight(5), _ "Position") Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "------------".PadRight(20), _ "----".PadRight(5), _ "--------") For Each e As XElement In po.DescendantsAndSelf() Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) & e.Name.ToString()).PadRight(20), _ (DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo)).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), _ (DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo)).LinePosition) Next ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` BaseUri: PurchaseOrder.xml Element Name Line Position ------------ ---- -------- PurchaseOrder 2 2 Address 3 4 Name 4 6 Street 5 6 City 6 6 State 7 6 Zip 8 6 Country 9 6 Address 11 4 Name 12 6 Street 13 6 City 14 6 State 15 6 Zip 16 6 Country 17 6 DeliveryNotes 19 4 Items 20 4 Item 21 6 ProductName 22 8 Quantity 23 8 USPrice 24 8 Comment 25 8 Item 27 6 ProductName 28 8 Quantity 29 8 USPrice 30 8 ShipDate 31 8 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过创建从 DOM 文档，然后使用若要创建，可以使用此方法在 LINQ to XML 树中创建 DOM 文档的副本。By creating an from a DOM document, and then using the to create an , this method can be used to create a copy of a DOM document in a LINQ to XML tree. 使用若要创建从包含 XML 的字符串。Use to create an from a string that contains XML. 设置无效，无法从加载时。Setting is not valid when loading from a . 或未将配置任一读取空格。The will be configured to either read whitespace or not. LINQ to XML 树将填充的空白节点的读取器图面。The LINQ to XML tree will be populated with the whitespace nodes that the reader surfaces. 这将是无论行为或不设置。This will be the behavior regardless of whether is set or not. 可能有也可能没有有效的基 URI。The may have a valid base URI or not. 如果您设置，基 URI 在 XML 树中设置从报告的基 URI 。If you set , the base URI will be set in the XML tree from the base URI that is reported by the . 可能有也可能没有有效的行信息。The may have a valid line information or not. 如果您设置，行信息将会在 XML 树中的报告的行信息。If you set , the line information will be set in the XML tree from the line information that is reported by the . 如果您设置，则对性能产生负面影响标志。There is a performance penalty if you set the flag. XML 文档加载后的行信息是准确的。The line information is accurate immediately after loading the XML document. 如果在加载文档之后修改 XML 树，行信息可能会变得毫无意义。If you modify the XML tree after loading the document, the line information may become meaningless. LINQ to XML 的加载功能基于。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能会捕获引发的任何异常重载的方法和方法来读取和分析该文档。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下面的示例加载它从加载的行信息。The following example loads the line information that it loads from the . 然后，它将打印的行信息。It then prints the line information. ```csharp string markup = @" "; // Create a reader and move to the content. using (XmlReader nodeReader = XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(markup))) { // the reader must be in the Interactive state in order to // Create a LINQ to XML tree from it. nodeReader.MoveToContent(); XElement xRoot = XElement.Load(nodeReader, LoadOptions.SetLineInfo); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "Element Name".PadRight(20), "Line".PadRight(5), "Position"); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "------------".PadRight(20), "----".PadRight(5), "--------"); foreach (XElement e in xRoot.DescendantsAndSelf()) Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) + e.Name).PadRight(20), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LinePosition); } ``` ```vb Dim markup As String = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ "" ' Create a reader and move to the content. Using nodeReader As XmlReader = XmlReader.Create(New StringReader(markup)) ' the reader must be in the Interactive state in order to ' Create a LINQ to XML tree from it. nodeReader.MoveToContent() Dim xRoot As XElement = XElement.Load(nodeReader, LoadOptions.SetLineInfo) Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "Element Name".PadRight(20), _ "Line".PadRight(5), _ "Position") Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "------------".PadRight(20), _ "----".PadRight(5), _ "--------") For Each e As XElement In xRoot.DescendantsAndSelf() Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) & e.Name.ToString).PadRight(20), _ (DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo)).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), _ (DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo)).LinePosition) Next End Using ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Element Name Line Position ------------ ---- -------- Root 1 2 Child 2 6 GrandChild 3 10 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性将引发和事件。Setting this property will raise the and the events. ## Examples 以下示例使用此属性来确定元素的名称。The following example uses this property to determine the name of an element. ```csharp XElement el1 = new XElement("Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(el1.Name); XNamespace ns = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement el2 = new XElement(ns + "Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(el2.Name); Console.WriteLine(el2.Name.Namespace); Console.WriteLine(el2.Name.LocalName); el2.Name = ns + "NewName"; Console.WriteLine(el2.Name); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim el1 As XElement = content Console.WriteLine(el1.Name) Dim el2 As XElement = content Console.WriteLine(el2.Name) Console.WriteLine(el2.Name.Namespace) Console.WriteLine(el2.Name.LocalName) Dim aw as XNamespace = GetXmlNamespace(aw) el2.Name = aw + "NewName" Console.WriteLine(el2.Name) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Root {http://www.adventure-works.com}Root http://www.adventure-works.com Root {http://www.adventure-works.com}NewName ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将转换为从某个属性或元素，允许的值为"0"、"1"和任何字符串，它会生成"true"或"false"转换为小写形式。When converting to from an attribute or element, allowed values are "0", "1", and any string that produces "true" or "false" after trimming and conversion to lower case. ## Examples 下面的示例使用布尔值创建一些元素。The following example creates some elements with boolean values. 然后将转换到。It then casts them to . ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("BoolValue1", true), new XElement("BoolValue2", false) ); bool bool1 = (bool)root.Element("BoolValue1"); bool bool2 = (bool)root.Element("BoolValue2"); Console.WriteLine("(bool)BoolValue1={0}", bool1); Console.WriteLine("(bool)BoolValue2={0}", bool2); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ true false Dim bool1 As Boolean = CBool(root.Element("BoolValue1")) Dim bool2 As Boolean = CBool(root.Element("BoolValue2")) Console.WriteLine("(bool)BoolValue1={0}", bool1) Console.WriteLine("(bool)BoolValue2={0}", bool2) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` (bool)BoolValue1=True (bool)BoolValue2=False ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性或包含日期和时间的内容的元素的值空间与日期和时间 ISO 8601 中所述紧密相关。The value space of an attribute or element that contains date and time content is closely related to the dates and times described in ISO 8601. 创建属性或元素，其中包含日期和时间的内容时，请按照 W3C 规范格式化属性或元素值。When creating an attribute or element that contains date and time content, the attribute or element values are formatted per the W3C specification. 请参阅 W3C 规范的更多详细信息。See the W3C specification for more details. 转换为时，行为并不严格从某个属性或元素。Behavior is lax when casting to a from an attribute or element. 即使格式属性或元素值不是完全按照 W3C 规范，值适当地转换为。Even if the attribute or element value is not formatted exactly per the W3C specification, the value is appropriately converted to a . 使用此转换运算符若要从转换。This conversion operator uses to convert from a . ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有日期和时间的内容的元素。The following example creates an element with date and time content. 它然后将其强制转换到检索值。It then casts it to to retrieve the value. ```csharp // Behavior is strict when formatting an XML element or attribute from a DateTime, // but behavior is lax when casting to a DateTime from an element or attribute. XElement root = new XElement("Root", new DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 0)); Console.WriteLine(root); // Cast from a strictly formatted XML element. DateTime dt = (DateTime)root; Console.WriteLine("dt={0}", dt); Console.WriteLine("-----"); // If root is formatted in some different way: XElement dtElement = new XElement("OrderDate", "October 6, 2006"); Console.WriteLine(dtElement); DateTime orderDate = (DateTime)dtElement; Console.WriteLine("orderDate={0:d}", orderDate); ``` ```vb ' Behavior is strict when formatting an XML element or attribute from a DateTime, ' but behavior is lax when casting to a DateTime from an element or attribute. Dim root As XElement = <%= New DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 0) %> Console.WriteLine(root) ' Cast from a strictly formatted XML element. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将转换为时的从某个属性或元素，允许的值为"0"、"1"和任何字符串，它会生成"true"或"false"转换为小写形式。When converting to of from an attribute or element, allowed values are "0", "1", and any string that produces "true" or "false" after trimming and conversion to lower case. ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有布尔内容的元素。The following example creates an element with boolean content. 然后检索的值通过强制转换为的。It then retrieves the value by casting to of . ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("BoolValue1", true), new XElement("BoolValue2", false)); bool? bool1 = (bool?)root.Element("BoolValue1"); bool? bool2 = (bool?)root.Element("BoolValue2"); Console.WriteLine("Nullable Boolean: value1={0}", bool1); Console.WriteLine("Nullable Boolean: value2={0}", bool2); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ true false Dim value1 As Nullable(Of Boolean) = CType(root.Element("BoolValue1"), Nullable(Of Boolean)) Dim value2 As Nullable(Of Boolean) = CType(root.Element("BoolValue2"), Nullable(Of Boolean)) Console.WriteLine("Nullable Boolean: value1={0}", IIf(value1.HasValue, value1.ToString(), "null")) Console.WriteLine("Nullable Boolean: value2={0}", IIf(value2.HasValue, value2.ToString(), "null")) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Nullable Boolean: value1=True Nullable Boolean: value2=False ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性或包含日期和时间的内容的元素的值空间与日期和时间 ISO 8601 中所述紧密相关。The value space of an attribute or element that contains date and time content is closely related to the dates and times described in ISO 8601. 创建属性或元素，其中包含日期和时间的内容时，请按照 W3C 规范格式化属性或元素值。When creating an attribute or element that contains date and time content, the attribute or element values are formatted per the W3C specification. 请参阅 W3C 规范的更多详细信息。See the W3C specification for more details. 转换为时的行为是宽松的从某个属性或元素。The behavior is lax when casting to a of from an attribute or element. 即使格式属性或元素值不是完全按照 W3C 规范，值适当地转换为的。Even if the attribute or element value is not formatted exactly per the W3C specification, the value is appropriately converted to a of . 使用此转换运算符若要从转换。This conversion operator uses to convert from a . ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有日期和时间作为内容的元素。The following example creates an element with a date and time as content. 然后检索的值通过强制转换为的。It then retrieves the value by casting to of . ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Value", new DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 0)) ); DateTime? value = (DateTime?)root.Element("Value"); Console.WriteLine("Nullable DateTime: value={0}", value == null ? "null" : value.ToString()); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ <%= New DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 0) %> Dim value As Nullable(Of DateTime) = CType(root.Element("Value"), Nullable(Of DateTime)) Console.WriteLine("Nullable DateTime: value={0}", IIf(value.HasValue, value.ToString(), "null")) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Nullable DateTime: value=10/6/2006 12:30:00 PM ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不保留空白区域。This method does not preserve white space. 如果你想要保留 XML 树中的空白区域，使用的重载方法采用作为参数。If you want to preserve white space in the XML tree, use the overload of the method that takes as a parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载或分析 XML 时保留空白](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)并[保留空白区域序列化时](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). LINQ to XML 的加载功能基于。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能会捕获引发的任何异常重载的方法和方法来读取和分析该文档。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 以下示例创建包含 XML 的字符串。The following example creates a string that contains XML. 它然后将字符串分析成。It then parses the string into an . ```csharp XElement xmlTree = XElement.Parse(" "); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml ```

summary.span: 从包含 XML 的字符串加载 ，还可以选择保留空白和行信息。

returns.span: 一个使用包含 XML 的字符串填充的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果源 XML 是缩进，则将设置标记中`options`导致读取器读取的源 XML 中的所有空白区域。If the source XML is indented, setting the flag in `options` causes the reader to read all white space in the source XML. 类型的节点为重要并无意义的空白区域创建。Nodes of type are created for both significant and insignificant white space. 如果源 XML 是缩进，则将不设置标记中`options`导致读取器忽略所有源 XML 中无意义的空白。If the source XML is indented, not setting the flag in `options` causes the reader to ignore all of the insignificant white space in the source XML. 不包括无关紧要的空白区域任何文本节点创建 XML 树。The XML tree is created without any text nodes for insignificant white space. 如果源 XML 不缩进，则将设置标记中`options`不起作用。If the source XML is not indented, setting the flag in `options` has no effect. 仍保留有效空白，并有可能导致创建多个空白文本节点的无用空格没有范围。Significant white space is still preserved, and there are no spans of insignificant white space that could cause the creation of more white space text nodes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载或分析 XML 时保留空白](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)并[保留空白区域序列化时](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). 设置不会影响从其进行分析时。Setting will have no effect when parsing from a . 可能有也可能没有有效的行信息。The may have a valid line information or not. 如果您设置，行信息将会在 XML 树中的报告的行信息。If you set , the line information will be set in the XML tree from the line information that is reported by the . 如果您设置，则对性能产生负面影响标志。There is a performance penalty if you set the flag. XML 文档加载后的行信息是准确的。The line information is accurate immediately after loading the XML document. 如果在加载文档之后修改 XML 树，行信息可能会变得毫无意义。If you modify the XML tree after loading the document, the line information may become meaningless. LINQ to XML 的加载功能基于。LINQ to XML's loading functionality is built upon . 因此，您可能会捕获引发的任何异常重载的方法和方法来读取和分析该文档。Therefore, you might catch any exceptions that are thrown by the overload methods and the methods that read and parse the document. ## Examples 下面的示例将字符串分析成两个不同的方式： 保留空白，并且不保留空白。The following example parses a string into an in two different ways: preserving white space, and not preserving white space. 然后使用查询来确定生成的 XML 树中的空白节点的数目。It then uses a query to determine the number of white space nodes in the resulting XML tree. ```csharp int whiteSpaceNodes; XElement xmlTree1 = XElement.Parse(" ", LoadOptions.None); whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree1 .DescendantNodesAndSelf() .OfType() .Where(tNode => tNode.ToString().Trim().Length == 0) .Count(); Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes); XElement xmlTree2 = XElement.Parse(" ", LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace); whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree2 .DescendantNodesAndSelf() .OfType() .Where(tNode => tNode.ToString().Trim().Length == 0) .Count(); Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes); ``` ```vb Dim whiteSpaceNodes As Integer Dim xmlTree1 As XElement = XElement.Parse(" ", LoadOptions.None) whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree1 _ .DescendantNodesAndSelf() _ .OfType(Of XText)() _ .Where(Function(ByVal tNode As XNode) tNode.ToString().Trim().Length = 0) _ .Count() Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes) Dim xmlTree2 As XElement = XElement.Parse(" ", LoadOptions.PreserveWhitespace) whiteSpaceNodes = xmlTree2 _ .DescendantNodesAndSelf() _ .OfType(Of XText)() _ .Where(Function(ByVal tNode As XNode) tNode.ToString().Trim().Length = 0) _ .Count() Console.WriteLine("Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): {0}", whiteSpaceNodes) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Count of white space nodes (not preserving whitespace): 0 Count of white space nodes (preserving whitespace): 3 ``` 下面的示例将在分析该字符串保留行信息。The following example retains line information as it parses the string. ```csharp string markup = @" "; XElement xRoot = XElement.Parse(markup, LoadOptions.SetLineInfo); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "Element Name".PadRight(20), "Line".PadRight(5), "Position"); Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", "------------".PadRight(20), "----".PadRight(5), "--------"); foreach (XElement e in xRoot.DescendantsAndSelf()) Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) + e.Name).PadRight(20), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), ((IXmlLineInfo)e).LinePosition); ``` ```vb Dim markup As String = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ " " & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim xRoot As XElement = XElement.Parse(markup, LoadOptions.SetLineInfo) Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "Element Name".PadRight(20), _ "Line".PadRight(5), _ "Position") Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ "------------".PadRight(20), _ "----".PadRight(5), _ "--------") For Each e As XElement In xRoot.DescendantsAndSelf() Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}{2}", _ ("".PadRight(e.Ancestors().Count() * 2) & e.Name.ToString).PadRight(20), _ DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo).LineNumber.ToString().PadRight(5), _ DirectCast(e, IXmlLineInfo).LinePosition) Next ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Element Name Line Position ------------ ---- -------- Root 1 2 Child 2 6 GrandChild 3 10 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将引发和事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有属性和子元素的元素。The following example creates an element with attributes and child elements. 然后，它调用此方法来删除的属性。It then calls this method to remove the attributes. 保留的子元素。The child elements remain. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", 1), new XAttribute("Att2", 2), new XAttribute("Att3", 3), new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3) ); root.RemoveAttributes(); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ 1 2 3 root.RemoveAttributes() Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 1 2 3 ```

summary.span: 将此元素的子节点和属性替换为指定的内容。

span.span: Replaces the child nodes and the attributes of this element with the specified content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用快照语义 — 它，它是当前元素的内容替换为新内容之前已创建新内容的单独副本。This method uses snapshot semantics—that is, it creates a separate copy of the new content before replacing the contents of the current element with the new content. 这意味着您可以查询当前元素的内容和查询的结果用作指定的新内容。This means that you can query the contents of the current element and use the results of the query as the specified new content. 有关可以传递给此函数的有效内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 此方法将引发和事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下面的示例将 LINQ 查询的结果传递给此方法中，元素的内容替换为查询结果。The following example passes the results of a LINQ query to this method, replacing the contents of an element with the query results. 它将查询为具有替换其内容的元素。It queries the element that is having its contents replaced. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Data", 1), new XElement("Data", 2), new XElement("Data", 3), new XElement("Data", 4), new XElement("Data", 5) ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); Console.WriteLine("-----"); xmlTree.ReplaceAll( from el in xmlTree.Elements() where (int)el >= 3 select new XElement("NewData", (int)el) ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) Console.WriteLine("-----") xmlTree.ReplaceAll( _ From el In xmlTree.Elements _ Where el.Value >= 3 _ Select <%= el.Value %> _ ) Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` 1 2 3 4 5 ----- 3 4 5 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法首先删除现有的内容和属性。This method first removes existing content and attributes. 然后添加指定`content`。It then adds the specified `content`. 此方法使用快照语义 — 它，它是当前元素的内容替换为新内容之前已创建新内容的单独副本。This method uses snapshot semantics—that is, it creates a separate copy of the new content before replacing the contents of the current element with the new content. 这意味着您可以查询当前元素的内容和查询的结果用作指定的新内容。This means that you can query the contents of the current element and use the results of the query as the specified new content. 有关可以传递给此函数的有效内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). 此方法将引发和事件。This method will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下面的示例将 LINQ 查询的结果传递给此方法中，元素的内容替换为查询结果。The following example passes the results of a LINQ query to this method, replacing the contents of an element with the query results. ```csharp XElement xmlTree1 = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5), new XElement("Child6", 6) ); XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", "child content") ); root.ReplaceAll( from el in xmlTree1.Elements() where((int)el >= 3 && (int)el <= 5) select el ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim xmlTree1 As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 6 Dim root As XElement = child content root.ReplaceAll( _ From el In xmlTree1.Elements() _ Where el.Value >= 3 And el.Value <= 5 _ Select el _ ) Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你想要保存未缩进的 XML，指定标记为可`options`。If you want to save unindented XML, specify the flag for `options`. 这会导致要完全按 XML 树中表示形式写入的所有空白的编写器。This will cause the writer to write all white space exactly as represented in the XML tree. 如果你想要保存缩进的 XML，不要指定标记为可`options`。If you want to save indented XML, do not specify the flag for `options`. 这将删除所有多余的无意义空白，并添加相应的无意义空白，以便的 XML 格式不正确缩进。This will remove all extraneous insignificant white space, and add appropriate insignificant white space so that the XML is properly indented. 这是默认行为和行为的重载方法不采用`options`作为参数。This is the default behavior, and the behavior of the overloads of the methods that do not take `options` as a parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载或分析 XML 时保留空白](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)并[保留空白区域序列化时](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). ## Examples 下面的示例演示此方法的两种用法。The following example shows two uses of this method. 第一次使用保留空白。The first use preserves white space. 第二个序列化使用格式设置。The second serializes the with formatting. 由于构造，该文档中不包含任何空格，保留空白时将 XML 输出而无需任何缩进。Because the document has no white space in it as constructed, preserving white space outputs the XML without any indenting. ```csharp XElement root = XElement.Parse(@" Text "); using (StringWriter sw = new StringWriter()) { root.Save(sw, SaveOptions.DisableFormatting); Console.WriteLine(sw.ToString()); } Console.WriteLine("====="); using (StringWriter sw = new StringWriter()) { root.Save(sw, SaveOptions.None); Console.WriteLine(sw.ToString()); } ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Text Using sw = New StringWriter() root.Save(sw, SaveOptions.DisableFormatting) Console.WriteLine(sw.ToString()) End Using Console.WriteLine("=====") Using sw = New StringWriter() root.Save(sw, SaveOptions.None) Console.WriteLine(sw.ToString()) End Using ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Text ===== Text ```

XElement root = XElement.Parse(@" Text "); root.Save("Root.xml", SaveOptions.DisableFormatting); str = File.ReadAllText("Root.xml"); Console.WriteLine(str); Console.WriteLine("====="); root.Save("Root.xml", SaveOptions.None); str = File.ReadAllText("Root.xml"); Console.WriteLine(str); ``` ```vb Dim str As String Dim root As XElement = Text root.Save("Root.xml", SaveOptions.DisableFormatting) str = File.ReadAllText("Root.xml") Console.WriteLine(str) Console.WriteLine("=====") root.Save("Root.xml", SaveOptions.None) str = File.ReadAllText("Root.xml") Console.WriteLine(str) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Text ===== Text ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法旨在使其易于维护的一系列子元素的名称/值对的列表。This method is designed to make it easy to maintain a list of name/value pairs as a set of children elements. 维护的列表，需要将编号对添加、 修改对，或删除对。When maintaining the list, you need to add pairs, modify pairs, or delete pairs. 如果调用此方法将不存在的名称传递为子元素，此方法会为您创建的子元素。If you call this method passing a name that does not exist as a child element, this method creates a child element for you. 如果调用此方法并传递现有的子元素的名称，此方法修改为你指定的值的子元素的值。If you call this method passing the name of an existing child element, this method modifies the value of the child element to the value that you specify. 如果传递`null`为`value`，此方法移除子元素。If you pass `null` for `value`, this method removes the child element. 此方法将引发事件。This method will raise events. 将值赋给具有指定名称的第一个子元素。The value is assigned to the first child element with the specified name. 如果没有具有指定名称的子元素存在，则添加新的子元素。If no child element with the specified name exists, a new child element is added. 如果值为 null，具有指定名称的第一个子元素，则删除如果存在。If the value is null, the first child element with the specified name, if any, is deleted. 此方法不会添加到指定的子元素的子节点或属性。This method does not add child nodes or attributes to the specified child element. 此方法将引发异常，如果任何对象，派生自作为传递`value`。This method throws an exception if any object that derives from is passed as `value`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[维护名称/值对](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe9798bf-b5e2-4a3c-a86c-7f8638912691)。For more information, see [Maintaining Name/Value Pairs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe9798bf-b5e2-4a3c-a86c-7f8638912691). ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有子元素的元素。The following example creates an element with a child element. 然后使用此方法将子元素的值。It then uses this method to set the value of the child element. ```csharp // Create an element with no content XElement root = new XElement("Root"); // Add some name/value pairs. root.SetElementValue("Ele1", 1); root.SetElementValue("Ele2", 2); root.SetElementValue("Ele3", 3); Console.WriteLine(root); // Modify one of the name/value pairs. root.SetElementValue("Ele2", 22); Console.WriteLine(root); // Remove one of the name/value pairs. root.SetElementValue("Ele3", null); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb ' Create an element with no content. Dim root As XElement = ' Add some name/value pairs. root.SetElementValue("Ele1", 1) root.SetElementValue("Ele2", 2) root.SetElementValue("Ele3", 3) Console.WriteLine(root) ' Modify one of the name/value pairs. root.SetElementValue("Ele2", 22) Console.WriteLine(root) ' Remove one of the name/value pairs. root.SetElementValue("Ele3", Nothing) Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` 1 2 3 1 22 3 1 22 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性，可以获取或设置元素的值。Using this property, you can get or set the value of an element. 设置此属性将引发和事件。Setting this property will raise the and the events. 如果你想要获取的元素值，但您不能确定它存在，它是更方便地使用显式转换运算符，并将元素分配为 null 的类型如`string`或的。If you want to get the value of an element but you are not sure that it exists, it is more convenient to use the explicit conversion operators, and assign the element to a nullable type such as `string` or of . 如果该元素不存在，可以为 null 的类型设置为`null`。If the element does not exist, the nullable type is set to `null`. 与此相反，如果你想要使用此属性，您必须确保方法不返回`null`访问此属性之前。By contrast, if you want to use this property, you must make sure that the method does not return `null` before you access this property. ## Examples 以下示例使用此属性以检索包含混合内容的元素的文本。The following example uses this property to retrieve the text of an element with mixed content. ```csharp XElement el = XElement.Parse("This is mixed content"); Console.WriteLine("{0}", el.Value); ``` ```vb Dim el As XElement = This is mixed content Console.WriteLine("{0}", el.Value) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` This is mixed content ```

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何编写到。The following example shows how to write an to an . 请注意此示例没有编写 XML 声明。Note that the example did not write an XML declaration. ```csharp StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(); XmlWriterSettings xws = new XmlWriterSettings(); xws.OmitXmlDeclaration = true; xws.Indent = true; using (XmlWriter xw = XmlWriter.Create(sb, xws)) { xw.WriteStartElement("Root"); XElement child1 = new XElement("Child", new XElement("GrandChild", "some content") ); child1.WriteTo(xw); XElement child2 = new XElement("AnotherChild", new XElement("GrandChild", "different content") ); child2.WriteTo(xw); xw.WriteEndElement(); } Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString()); ``` ```vb Dim sb As StringBuilder = New StringBuilder() Dim xws As XmlWriterSettings = New XmlWriterSettings() xws.OmitXmlDeclaration = True xws.Indent = True Using xw = XmlWriter.Create(sb, xws) xw.WriteStartElement("Root") Dim child1 As XElement = _ some content child1.WriteTo(xw) Dim child2 As XElement = _ different content child2.WriteTo(xw) xw.WriteEndElement() End Using Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString()) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml some content different content ```
